reviews.review: Starts out causing heartburn, but eventually you get comfortable, then it has a surprising amount of replayability and depth.
i only started recently but i really enjoy it, then again i play mainly with friends. Its really easy for me anyway i just stalk around and im fine, for survivor anyway.
this game has so many fun times weather you are a single player or qeued with a whole group
